resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Running instance failed as OSG server responded with HTTP code 403

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

Using Eucalyptus 4.2 (4.2.0-0.0.23842.635.20150910gitce0763d.el6) cloud, I bundled, uploaded and registered the following image types:

* paravirtual ([Ubuntu Trusty x86-64 Paravirt Image|http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/trusty/current/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.tar.gz])
* HVM ([Ubuntu Trusty x86-64 HVM Image|http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/trusty/current/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img])

The instance based off the paravirt image never reached 'running' state.  It went to 'terminated' state.
{code}
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-bc7d6d92
RESERVATION	r-1295fd79	000824996226
INSTANCE	i-bc7d6d92	emi-d52cc5f6			terminated	euca-admin	0		m1.medium	2015-09-11T14:17:33.777Z	one	eki-629c2d85	eri-15d3468a		monitoring-disabled					instance-store					paravirtual							x86_64
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-describe-images emi-d52cc5f6
IMAGE	emi-d52cc5f6	ubuntu-trusty-paravirt/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml	000824996226	available	private	x86_64	machine	eki-629c2d85	eri-15d3468a		instance-store	paravirtual
TAG	image	emi-d52cc5f6	image_version	Ubuntu 14.04.3 LTS (Trusty Tahr) Daily Build [20150909.1] Paravirtual
{code}

*Signs*

* Looking at the logs on the NC, I saw the following:
{code}
...
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35  INFO 000009964 doRunInstance            | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] running instance groupId=sg-d9c58962 cores=1 disk=10 memory=1024 vlan=-1 net=-1 priMAC=d0:0d:bc:7d:6d:92 privIp=10.111.30.207 plat=linux kernel=(null) ramdisk=(null)
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000009964 vbr_legacy               | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92]                VBR[0] type=swap id=none dev=sda3 size=536870912 format=swap none
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000009964 vbr_legacy               | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92]                VBR[1] type=ephemeral id=none dev=sda2 size=8724152320 format=ext3 none
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000009964 vbr_legacy               | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92]                VBR[2] type=kernel id=eki-629c2d85 dev=none size=5821152 format=none http://imaging@10.111.5.112:8773/services/objectstorage/b0e300-download-manifests-v2/DM-eki-629c2d85-r-1295fd79?Expires=1441991854&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAASPLPUW4AIA4O6KP&x-amz-security-token=ZXVjYQABqr8dY0TMBXVmRsUT%2Fd27P%2FuPqWbuPE6iD5HAzrqeXhEu0px9l9i010Fg9eNGKIt%2BzP5yeGb%2FPuoV0hh0aFzHO5LmRVX1deWTgCEw1q7Gr9TjDWqj6s2KS9O73y83%2BxkRXuYWKqVEI4Ef2y5EMF%2Fct8SnBLCALElD%2BtIWqkpTqoTrhygSjfJFIxZzW%2FNdRVvkI%2F1fh%2F1nk9E81S6fkA0J2ay6s1LMT3U4twKL1E270QnVYP7htEeyKLs%3D&Signature=4pLXRIt%2B03lG%2ByEePFL%2BOjSaeos%
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000009964 vbr_legacy               | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92]                VBR[3] type=ramdisk id=eri-15d3468a dev=none size=91708 format=none http://imaging@10.111.5.112:8773/services/objectstorage/b0e300-download-manifests-v2/DM-eri-15d3468a-r-1295fd79?Expires=1441991854&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAASQGMW5R6NHOBPEM&x-amz-security-token=ZXVjYQAByWJqA%2FjVQQKoA9GN6HGtIj6BAYFt%2BGRhDzw3aZTiwF%2BoAOziOZH3%2BXG75mTjeWNMpdsq%2Bz2KZxlGxowteAqpDxu9rx8GVdpdTsSdrgcWpWDaVDkLH8L7dL5dyiRoEcTx1bCGdZ4aBX0GRsZ0sn1K2eYz0yZ30yNy2x0EXNGbJ8ffF%2FBy06faEWL8MMbJXrer6f7mF%2FjUplnlubYU85KtDvylydWtZVEDxcSwnaGJfLFC27zDBQNFwvg%3D&Signature=Vr8YUDvLfjT8sTic0P9nSWPhC%2FU%3D
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000009964 vbr_legacy               | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92]                VBR[4] type=machine id=emi-d52cc5f6 dev=sda1 size=1476395008 format=none http://imaging@10.111.5.112:8773/services/objectstorage/b0e300-download-manifests-v2/DM-r-1295fd79?Expires=1441991855&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAAWKHTCM7SVWRZGRX&x-amz-security-token=ZXVjYQAB2HWDctfkH4%2BBvSBVFiqyosmGwxMmXnDfJb3kjNXTCaJp9lFehIbcbcUTqBSb2NM3g9jbjnyT710H4EesR7dNVoRoZ%2BBqsa1eNRVP7wyUh05jAowjjra5bXX2to%2Ba3mhCHNQunGOw7vv%2BY%2FGal4BsGHqZOjPJEOqGC4CDmbYa1Tp9k%2BKTj1B49%2FINskraTLRb3majlg5aVixXoFEWI%2B6WVHCmN%2B3fzurY1IzqXgfHrD7Ud2DNgGGrCIQ%3D&Signature=kDiLdItR98QpgVVazSCQJwIq9wM%3D
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000009964 change_state             | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] state change for instance: Unknown -> Staging (Pending)
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 startup_thread           | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] spawning startup thread
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35  INFO 000005979 ensure_directories_exist | [f677be8a-3b8c] creating path /var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDAA6TUVT2DLTUZ5Z5QV/i-bc7d6d92
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 diskutil_ch              | [f677be8a-3b8c] ch(own|mod) '/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDAA6TUVT2DLTUZ5Z5QV/i-bc7d6d92' *.root 771
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 vbr_alloc_tree           | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] found 2 prereqs and 3 partitions/disks in the VBR
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 art_alloc                | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] allocated artifact 011|i-bc7d6d92 size=-1 vbr=(nil) cache=0 file=0
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 art_alloc_vbr            | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] failed to obtain image manifest from object storage
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 create_instance_backing  | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] failed to prepare extended backing for instance
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 startup_thread           | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] failed to prepare images for instance (error=1)
/var/log/eucalyptus/nc-tracking.log:2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 change_state             | [f677be8a-3b8c] [i-bc7d6d92] state change for instance: Staging -> Shutoff (Pending)
..
{code}
* Setup can be found here - [hspencer-1206|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1206/]. *+Cloud will be left up for debugging purposes.+*
* NC logs attached

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.2 cloud using EQS
# Download [Ubuntu Trusty x86-64 tar-gzipped file|http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/trusty/current/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.tar.gz] onto the CLC
# Untar the file
{code}
[root@c-16 ~]# tar -zxvf trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.tar.gz
trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img
trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic
trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader
trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-floppy
README.files
{code}
# Bundle, upload and register the kernel, ramdisk and root image
{code}
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-bundle-image -i trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader --ramdisk true -r x86_64
Bundling image 100% |===============================================================================================================================================================|  89.56 kB  95.14 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
Wrote manifest /var/tmp/bundle-3fhgSG/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader.manifest.xml
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-upload-bundle -b ubuntu-trusty-ramdisk -m /var/tmp/bundle-3fhgSG/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader.manifest.xml
/var/tmp/bundle-3fhgSG/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader.part.00 100% |===========================================================================================================|  89.38 kB 605.26 kB/s Time: 0:00:00
Uploaded ubuntu-trusty-ramdisk/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader.manifest.xml
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-register -n ubuntu-trusty-ramdisk ubuntu-trusty-ramdisk/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader.manifest.xml
IMAGE	eri-15d3468a
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-bundle-image -i trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic --kernel true -r x86_64
Bundling image 100% |===============================================================================================================================================================|   5.55 MB  30.06 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
Wrote manifest /var/tmp/bundle-mQtqWP/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic.manifest.xml

/var/tmp/bundle-mQtqWP/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic.part.00 100% |==================================================================================================|   5.49 MB  22.87 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
Uploaded ubuntu-trusty-kernel/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic.manifest.xml
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-register -n ubuntu-trusty-kernel ubuntu-trusty-kernel/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic.manifest.xml
IMAGE	eki-629c2d85
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-bundle-image -i trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img --kernel eki-629c2d85 --ramdisk eri-15d3468a -r x86_64
Bundling image 100% |===============================================================================================================================================================|   1.38 GB  40.62 MB/s Time: 0:00:36
Wrote manifest /var/tmp/bundle-MQgDVP/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml

/var/tmp/bundle-MQgDVP/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.part.00 100% |==============================================================================================================|  10.00 MB  29.72 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-MQgDVP/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.part.01 100% |==============================================================================================================|  10.00 MB  34.71 MB/s Time: 0:00:00

IMAGE	emi-d52cc5f6
{code}
# Run instance based off EMI
{code}
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-run-instances -k euca-admin -t m1.medium emi-d52cc5f6

INSTANCE	i-bc7d6d92	emi-d52cc5f6	10.111.30.181	10.111.30.207	pending	euca-admin	0		m1.medium	2015-09-11T14:17:33.777Z	one	eki-629c2d85	eri-15d3468a		monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.181	10.111.30.207			instance-store					paravirtual			sg-d9c58962				x86_64
{code}
# Observe state going to 'terminated'
{code}
[root@c-16 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-1295fd79	000824996226
INSTANCE	i-bc7d6d92	emi-d52cc5f6			terminated	euca-admin	0		m1.medium	2015-09-11T14:17:33.777Z	one	eki-629c2d85	eri-15d3468a		monitoring-disabled					instance-store					paravirtual							x86_64
{code}
fields.summary: Paravirt Instance-Store Backed Instances Fail to Reach 'running' state

comments.body:
This is likely either the same as EUCA-10723 or a similar (URL truncation) issue:

{code}
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 startup_thread           | [i-bc7d6d92] spawning startup thread
2015-09-11 07:17:35  INFO 000005979 ensure_directories_exist | creating path /var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDAA6TUVT2DLTUZ5Z5QV/i-bc7d6d92
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 diskutil_ch              | ch(own|mod) '/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDAA6TUVT2DLTUZ5Z5QV/i-bc7d6d92' *.root 771
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 vbr_alloc_tree           | [i-bc7d6d92] found 2 prereqs and 3 partitions/disks in the VBR
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 art_alloc                | [i-bc7d6d92] allocated artifact 011|i-bc7d6d92 size=-1 vbr=(nil) cache=0 file=0
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 http_get_timeout         | downloading /tmp/http-reply-pIMsPJ
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 http_get_timeout         | from http://10.111.5.112:8773/services/objectstorage/b0e300-download-manifests-v2/DM-eki-629c2d85-r-1295fd79?Expires=1441991854&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAASPLPUW4AIA4O6KP&x-amz-security-token=ZXVjYQABqr8dY0TMBXVmRsUT%2Fd27P%2FuPqWbuPE6iD5HAzrqeXhEu0px9l9i010Fg9eNGKIt%2BzP5yeGb%2FPuoV0hh0aFzHO5LmRVX1deWTgCEw1q7Gr9TjDWqj6s2KS9O73y83%2BxkRXuYWKqVEI4Ef2y5EMF%2Fct8SnBLCALElD%2BtIWqkpTqoTrhygSjfJFIxZzW%2FNdRVvkI%2F1fh%2F1nk9E81S6fkA0J2ay6s1LMT3U4twKL1E270QnVYP7htEeyKLs%3D&Signature=4pLXRIt%2B03lG%2ByEePFL%2BOjSaeos%
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 http_get_timeout         | writing GET output to /tmp/http-reply-pIMsPJ
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 http_get_timeout         | wrote 293 bytes in 1 writes
2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 http_get_timeout         | server responded with HTTP code 403 for http://10.111.5.112:8773/services/objectstorage/b0e300-download-manifests-v2/DM-eki-629c2d85-r-1295fd79?Expires=1441991854&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAASPLPUW4AIA4O6KP&x-amz-security-token=ZXVjYQABqr8dY0TMBXVmRsUT%2Fd27P%2FuPqWbuPE6iD5HAzrqeXhEu0px9l9i010Fg9eNGKIt%2BzP5yeGb%2FPuoV0hh0aFzHO5LmRVX1deWTgCEw1q7Gr9TjDWqj6s2KS9O73y83%2BxkRXuYWKqVEI4Ef2y5EMF%2Fct8SnBLCALElD%2BtIWqkpTqoTrhygSjfJFIxZzW%2FNdRVvkI%2F1fh%2F1nk9E81S6fkA0J2ay6s1LMT3U4twKL1E270QnVYP7htEeyKLs%3D&Signature=4pLXRIt%2B03lG%2ByEePFL%2BOjSaeos%
2015-09-11 07:17:35  WARN 000005979 http_get_timeout         | removing /tmp/http-reply-pIMsPJ
2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 http_get2str             | failed to download http reply to /tmp/http-reply-pIMsPJ
2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 art_alloc_vbr            | [i-bc7d6d92] failed to obtain image manifest from object storage
2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 create_instance_backing  | [i-bc7d6d92] failed to prepare extended backing for instance
2015-09-11 07:17:35 ERROR 000005979 startup_thread           | [i-bc7d6d92] failed to prepare images for instance (error=1)
2015-09-11 07:17:35 DEBUG 000005979 change_state             | [i-bc7d6d92] state change for instance: Staging -> Shutoff (Pending)
{code}
It appears the imaging worker did not convert the PV images.
Oops just realized that we don't convert PV images anymore.

Resolved as a duplicate of [EUCA-10723], fix for that ticket is in master branch. If you continue to see this problem please re-open this ticket. Based on the log output I agree with [~sjones], that this is likely a URL truncation issue causing a 403 response.
